TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DBNull extends System.Object implements class System.IConvertible, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class DBNull Implements IConvertible, ISerializable
public ref class DBNull sealed : IConvertible, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type DBNull = class interface ISerializable interface IConvertible

span.span: Represents a nonexistent value.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示不存在的值。The class represents a nonexistent value. 例如，在数据库中，表的行中的列不可能包含任何数据。In a database, for example, a column in a row of a table might not contain any data whatsoever. 也就是说，列被视为根本不存在，而不是只是不具有值。That is, the column is considered to not exist at all instead of merely not having a value. 一个对象都表示不存在的列。A object represents the nonexistent column. 此外，COM 互操作使用类，以区分 VT_NULL 变体，用于指示不存在的值和 VT_EMPTY 变体，用于指示未指定的值。Additionally, COM interop uses the class to distinguish between a VT_NULL variant, which indicates a nonexistent value, and a VT_EMPTY variant, which indicates an unspecified value. 类型是一个单一实例类，这意味着只有一个对象存在。The type is a singleton class, which means only one object exists. 成员表示单独对象。The member represents the sole object. 可用于显式将不存在的值分配到数据库字段中，尽管大多数的 ADO.NET 数据提供程序自动分配的值字段没有有效的值。 can be used to explicitly assign a nonexistent value to a database field, although most ADO.NET data providers automatically assign values of when a field does not have a valid value. 您可以确定从数据库字段中检索某个值是否通过将为该字段的值传递值`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法。You can determine whether a value retrieved from a database field is a value by passing the value of that field to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 但是，某些语言和数据库对象提供一些方法，使其更轻松地确定数据库字段的值是否为。However, some languages and database objects supply methods that make it easier to determine whether the value of a database field is . 其中包括 Visual Basic`IsDBNull`函数，方法，方法，和方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, and the method. 不要混淆这一概念`null`在面向对象的编程语言与对象。Do not confuse the notion of `null` in an object-oriented programming language with a object. 在面向对象的编程语言中，`null`表示不存在的对象的引用。In an object-oriented programming language, `null` means the absence of a reference to an object. 表示一个未初始化的变量或不存在的数据库列。 represents an uninitialized variant or nonexistent database column. ## Examples 下面的示例调用`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法，以确定联系人数据库中的数据库字段是否具有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 如果是这样，字段值追加到字符串输出在标签中。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]

param.span: 用于实现 接口和增强转换的对象。

param.span: 如果指定了 ，则从当前区域获得格式信息。

summary.span: 将当前的 对象转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts the current object to the specified type.

returns.span: 如果支持这种转换，则返回当前 对象的等效装箱项；否则将引发异常，并且不返回任何值。

span.span: The boxed equivalent of the current object, if that conversion is supported; otherwise, an exception is thrown and no value is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持三种转换： 如果`type`参数指定或，则返回值是当前对象本身。Three conversions are supported: If the `type` parameter specifies or , the return value is the current object itself. 如果`type`参数指定，返回值是返回的字符串方法。If the `type` parameter specifies , the return value is the string returned by the method.

span.span: This conversion is not supported for the type.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.DBNull Value
Public Shared ReadOnly Value As DBNull

summary.span: 表示 类的唯一实例。

span.span: Represents the sole instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个单一实例类，这意味着可以存在此类的此实例。 is a singleton class, which means only this instance of this class can exist. 如果数据库字段有缺失数据，则可以使用属性来显式分配对象的字段的值。If a database field has missing data, you can use the property to explicitly assign a object value to the field. 但是，大多数数据访问接口自动执行此操作。However, most data providers do this automatically. 若要评估的数据库字段，以确定它们的值是否，可以将传递到的字段值`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法。To evaluate database fields to determine whether their values are , you can pass the field value to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 但是，很少使用此方法，因为有多种其他方法来评估缺少数据的数据库字段。However, this method is rarely used because there are a number of other ways to evaluate a database field for missing data. 其中包括 Visual Basic`IsDBNull`函数，方法，方法，方法和其他几种方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, the method, and several other methods. ## Examples 下面的示例调用`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法，以确定联系人数据库中的数据库字段是否具有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 如果是这样，字段值追加到字符串输出在标签中。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]
